name: Healthy Coconut Cream Pie
ingredients: 1 4 serving size vanilla instant pudding mix
instructions: Crush cereal and mix with sugar.
Press in bottom and up side of 9‚Äù pie plate.
In bowl mix milk, coconut milk and vanilla.
With whisk , beat in pudding mix until well blended and slightly thickened.
Gently stir in 1/2 c. cool whip.
Spoon and spread mix into crust.
Refrigerate at least 4 hours or until set.
To serve top with remaining cool whip and sprinkle with toasted coconut.
